languages.text: If there is an enemy in an adjacent cell to Arbitrator, once per turn ranged weapon attacks cost 1 AP less.

traits.locale_text: If there is an enemy in an adjacent cell to Arbitrator, once per turn ranged weapon attacks cost 1 AP less.

languages.text: After the Arbitrator uses a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} or a {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g}, they gain +{uip|Coercion|3227585cd33e4cd6b7cb24f2c23492be} to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g} and +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}block{/g} until the end of combat.
languages.original_text: Совершив {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}героический акт{/g} или прибегнув к {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}отчаянным мерам{/g}, арбитр получает +{uip|Coercion|3227585cd33e4cd6b7cb24f2c23492be} к {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Напору{/g} и +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}блока{/g} до конца боя.

traits.locale_text: After the Arbitrator uses a heroic act or a desperate measure, they gain +{uip|Coercion|3227585cd33e4cd6b7cb24f2c23492be} to Coercion and +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus}% block until the end of combat.

After the use of a Heroic Act Arbitrator gains +{uip|Coercion|3227585cd33e4cd6b7cb24f2c23492be} to Coercion and +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus}% to Block Chance until the end of combat.

languages.text: Yargıcı, {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}kahramanca eylem{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}son çare önlem{/g} yaptıktan sonra +{uip|Coercion|3227585cd33e4cd6b7cb24f2c23492be} {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Gözdağı{/g} yeteneği ve +%{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}bloklama{/g} kazanır. Etkisi, çatışma sonuna dek sürer.

languages.text: Après avoir eu recours à un {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acte héroïque{/g} ou une {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}mesure désespérée{/g}, l'arbitrator gagne un bonus de +{uip|Coercion|3227585cd33e4cd6b7cb24f2c23492be} à l'{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Intimidation{/g} et de +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} % au {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}blocage{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat.
